The Blessed One was staying at Vulture Peak Mountain by Rājagṛha, together with a great saṅgha of eight hundred monks, and with forty-two thousand bodhisattvas.

They traveled to Vulture Peak Mountain, here in this Sahā world, where the blessed, thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Śākyamuni dwelled.

$2 As the bodhisattva great being Amalagarbha arrived in the sky, surrounded and attended by a great assembly of bodhisattvas, the Blessed One noticed him.
གཟིགས་ ནས་ ཀྱང་ བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་ འདི་ སྙམ་ དུ་ དགོངས་ ཏེ །_
As he caught sight of him, the Blessed One thought,

“The bodhisattva great being Amalagarbha has been dispatched here by the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Saṃkusumita in order to receive the Dharma teaching called The Exposition on the Universal Gateway.
ངས་ ཀྱང་ བྱང་ཆུབ་ སེམས་དཔའ་ དག་ བསྡུ་བ ར་ བྱ་བ ར་ ངེས་ སོ་ སྙམ་ དུ་ དགོངས་ སོ །_།
Therefore, I, for my part, should gather the bodhisattvas.”

offered him the thousand-petaled lotus. $4 Amalagarbha then said to the Blessed One,
